speakers.name: Mr.Sagar Ranshoor
speakers.description: E-cell FCRIT Vashi is an inspiring hub for budding entrepreneurs. It fosters creativity, collaboration, and innovation. Through workshops, events, and mentorship, it empowers students to realize their entrepreneurial dreams.

speakers.name: Mr.Yogendra Joshi
speakers.description: The E-Cell at FCRIT Vashi fosters innovation, entrepreneurship, and collaboration, empowering students to transform ideas into ventures. It cultivates a dynamic ecosystem essential for nurturing future leaders and innovators.

speakers.name: Mr.Shivkumar Valadi
speakers.description: I see a lot of energy that has a lot of potential if channelised in the right way. Love the initiative of the E-Cell and the industry-student interactions which helps prepare the students for their corporate and entrepreneurial life ahead.

speakers.name: Mr.Mahendra Dongre
speakers.description: E-Cell FCRIT Vashi is a dynamic platform fostering entrepreneurial spirit. It empowers students with practical skills, mentorship, and networking opportunities, igniting innovation and nurturing future leaders effectively.
